panels.description: Bulks that were saved to metadata table
panels.title: Bulks created

targets.query: SELECT mean("Sum") FROM "autogen"."CifsEnricher.EventsCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Max") FROM "autogen"."CifsEnricher.EventsLatency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Count") FROM "autogen"."CifsEnricher.FetchingThroughput" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Count") FROM "autogen"."CifsEnricher.FailedEventsCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: The number of elements we fetch from DB in a single fetch

panels.title: Filtered Events

panels.description: Enhancing Translation - Number of failed translation

targets.query: SELECT "Count" FROM "CifsEnricher.FailedEventsCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Process Message Failures

targets.measurement: Varonis Sql Extractor.Batches Duration In Seconds

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "Varonis Solr Loader.Document" WHERE ("Operation" = 'Loaded') AND $timeFilter
